requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 8
  • Processor: 2Ghz +
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7000 series / Radeon 3500 series or newer. The game will run on any video card on the market today.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any soundcard

  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 3Ghz +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7000 series / Radeon 3500 series or newer. The game will run on any video card on the market today.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any soundcard
